reviewtext: This product gets three stars for being the exact product I needed.  I couldn't find any other offerings for a headphone extension with potentiometer volume controls.  It loses two stars for how it crackled and had a poor connection almost as soon as I got it in the mail, due to a low quality cable that easily breaks inside.
summary: It loses two stars for how it crackled and had a poor connection almost as soon as I got it in ...
